RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo SELECT DISK=0&echo CLEAN&echo CONVERT GPT&echo CREATE PARTITION EFI SIZE=300&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=FAT32 LABEL="System"&echo CREATE PARTITION MSR SIZE=16)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo SHRINK MINIMUM=1000&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Windows"&echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Recovery")"
cmd.exe /c "diskpart.exe /s "X:\diskpart.txt" >>"X:\diskpart.log" || ( type "X:\diskpart.log" & echo diskpart encountered an error. & pause & exit /b 1 )"

Extensions.File:
:: This will restore the classic right click menu reg add HKU\DefaultUser\Software\Classes\CLSID\{86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}\InprocServer32 /f /ve
:: This will make the taskbar less like Apple reg add HKU\DefaultUser\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced /v TaskbarAl /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
:: This will remove fun facts tips and more on the lock screen reg add HKU\DefaultUser\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager /v RotatingLockScreenOverlayEnabled /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f reg add HKU\DefaultUser\\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager /v SubscribedContent-338387Enabled /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
